title: How much did it cost to film the music video for Blackpink's 'DDU-DU DDU-DU'? - Quora

response.answer_text: While I haven't researched on their exact production budget, Based on their extravagant wardrobe alone we can safely assume that they have spent a ludicrous amount. According to MoaMoa, here are Rosé‘s outfits prices and origin. She wears Alexander McQueen’s cold ruffled stretch-knit mini dress of USD$3875. This is the most expensive outfit in the MV.  Alexander McQueen She also wears a Y/Project’s mini dress of USD$958 and Michael Kors’s top of USD$511.  Jennie also wears renown designer’s outfits. Dolce & Gabbana’s corset and gown of around USD$3086 (3.5 million wons), Vivienne Westwood’s jacket of USD$724, Vivienne Westwood’s pendant of USD$213, Marine Serre’s top of USD$256, and Cav Empt’s pants USD$329.   Jisoo was wearing Calvin Klein’s top of USD$310, YSL’s jacket of USD$3010, and Paco Rabanne’s bra of USD$106.  Lisa was wearing a lot of them such as Y/Project’s boots of USD$2192, Chanel’s earrings of USD$2150, Balenciaga’s heels of around USD$1986 (2.250.000 wons) and Alexander McQueen’s blazer of USD$2079.  Continuing with ALYX’s blazer of USD$1655 and trousers of USD$900, Balenciaga’s boots of USD$1040, Paco Rabanne’s trousers of USD$203 and Natasha Zinko’s dress of USD$2257.   CREDITS:Find Out About Ultra Expensive Outfits Worn By BLACKPINK In ‘DDU-DU DDU-DU”s MV

Their outfits alone cost alot so the price of the MV could have been maybe a few hundren thousand to a few million dollars. But their company is very rich and they nake alot of money. https://www.koreaboo.com/lists/blackpink-ddu-du-ddu-du-mv-outfits/
